name: Picture of a Daydream
description:
Made for the RPG Maker Jam 2 organized by my friend FoxFiesta, the theme was "Illusion"

Content Warning : One non-optional dialog has vulgar language in it

Sidenotes :

I've encountered an insanely high amount of difficulty making this game, going over 6 hours the time limit (luckily, the organizer was understanding and many others projects suffered from major issues too). I think it's playable?

A lot of planned gameplay mechanics and narration had to be cut from the game which in my opinion massively reduced the game fun and value. But hey, jams are jams and everything can happen.

Nonetheless I'm happy with this project, it was a much higher scope than Maria's Walk Service my entry to the previous RPG Maker Jam.

Credits :

Tiny16 by Lanea Zimmerman (Sharm) + expanded characters by capbros  + custom extensions by Imanor  
Computer sprite by Matsuo Kaito

Scripts by RME Team (RME, ORMS), Zeus81 (Fullscreen++, Lights & Shadows and Map Effects), Khas Arcthunder's Sapphire Action System IV, Yanfly's Engine Ace - Ace Message, CSCA Splash Screen

Known Issues :
Emma sometimes doesn't follow the player correctly
Lighting is wrong in the last and second-to-last chamber map
Musics can overlap, get cut at unfortunate moments, not loop properly etc. (Can't be fixed, RPG Maker's audio engine is bad)
Names doesn't always follow opacity rules correctly
The axing sounds and sprites are horrendous

Have fun!
